description:
Color Story: Pixa's Quest

Game Description:

Color Story: Pixa's Quest is a 2d side-scroller starring a girl named Pixa who discovers she is one of a special class of people who can use color magic, although it seems that no other color magic users are left.  As Pixa you must learn to use your color magic to enhance your platforming abilities and ultimately defeat the evil Earl Grey, with the help of your trusty palette Pal-ette. Color Story features hand drawn graphics and animations.

This is an engine test demo to test the game and abilities out. All 12 main abilities are available to try in this Demo. This is a work in progress so please report any bugs and forgive anything which is not finished.

Controls:

The game controls are detailed on the title page, you can also change the controls in the pause menu. Pixa has a few special moves as well: 

  • Press down while in the air: aerial kick attack
  • Press attack while ducking: slide kick attack
  • Press jump while ducking on certain platforms to drop through them
  • Pixa will roll when landing from a high enough jump. If you jump while rolling you will jump higher. Rolling can be cancelled by jumping, turning around, attacking, or slowed down by releasing the movement direction.
  • To equip or toggle abilities in the pause screen select them with the attack button
